si.title: ස්ත්රිය සඳහා දින 14 ක පැහැදිලි කිරීම
body_lines: නඩුව දින 14 ක් සඳහා රිමාන්ඩ් භාරයට පත් කරන ලෙස කල්මුනායි මහේස්ත්රාත්වරයා නියෝග කර ඇති අතර නඩුව පෙබරවාරි 28 දක්වා කල් තබන ලදී.
මෙම නඩුව විභාගයට ගැනිණි. මෙම නඩුව විභාගයට ගැනිණි.

en.title: 14 Days of Explanation for Woman
body_lines: The Kalmunai Magistrate has ordered the postponement of the case to be remanded for 14 days, and the case was postponed until February 28.

Kalmunai Magistrate MSM Samsudheen was again ordered to appear again on Wednesday (14) after the suspect was arrested by the headquarters of the Kalmunai headquarters in connection with the death of a boy who was placed in the Children's Probation School in the Kalmunai Headquarters Division of the Ampara District.
The applications of the police and the defendant's lawyer have been investigated as the case has been taken up and ordered to be remanded again, Supervisor of the 28 -year -old school.

summary_lines: The Kalmunai Magistrate postponed a case for 14 days, with the suspect arrested for a boy's death at the Children's Probation School in Kalmunai. The case will be remanded again, and the police and defendant's lawyer's applications are under investigation.
